LanguageData.aka_CarpetPinkWool_Blueprint.label: Pink wool carpet
LanguageData.aka_CarpetPinkWool_Frame.label: Pink wood carpet (blueprint)
LanguageData.aka_CarpetPinkWool_Frame.description: Plush carpet made from a fluffy pink wool.
LanguageData.aka_PinkWoodPlankFloor_Blueprint.label: Pink wood flooring
LanguageData.aka_PinkWoodPlankFloor_Frame.label: Pink wood flooring (blueprint)
LanguageData.aka_PinkWoodPlankFloor_Frame.description: Flooring made from pink wool wood. Just as flammable as regular wood, but a little nicer to look at.
LanguageData.aka_TilePinkStone_Blueprint.label: Pink wood stone tiles
LanguageData.aka_TilePinkStone_Frame.label: Pink wood stone tiles (blueprint)
LanguageData.aka_TilePinkStone_Frame.description: A pretty pink stone flooring made from pink wool wood which is made from pink wool. Confused yet? Also, it doesn't burn, for some reason. Hopefully.
